titleStmt.title: The eating of the body of Christ, considered in its principles. By John Despagne minister of the gospel. Translated out of French into English, by John Rivers of Chaford in Sussex, Esquire.
titleStmt.author: Espagne, Jean d', 1591-1659.
Rivers, John, of Chaford in Sussex.
Beau, Wil.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.N. for Anthony Williamson, and are to be sold at the sign of the Queens Arms in Pauls-Church-yard, neer the West end,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
